listing_company_name: McGrath Estate Agents - Coast and Hinterland
description:
Situated on an elevated 2083sqm block only 20mins to beaches and Sunshine Coast University Hospital atop the sought-after Palmview Forest Estate, this grand four-bedroom residence presents an oasis of leafy tranquillity coupled with breathtaking sunsets and lux finishes.

The captivating home features four built-in bedrooms; a spacious, galley kitchen with large butler's pantry and generous open-plan living connecting seamlessly via stacker doors to the impressive alfresco designed to embrace the panoramic views.

Blending a contemporary colour pallet and high-end finishes with creature comforts including ducted air conditioning, integrated sound system and remote blinds, this stunning property presents in as new condition and is ready to move in and embrace the ultimate tree-change lifestyle.

With excellent separation and a flexible floorplan, 93 Palmview Forest Drive presents a range of living options to suit a plethora of buyers. An inspection is highly recommended to truly appreciate this stunning home, please call today.

- Established in 2016
- Rendered block and weatherboard
- Colorbond roof with ceiling batt insulation
- 2083sqm elevated parcel with 70m frontage and landscaped gardens
- Triple bay shed with high clearance
- Lux kitchen with 6 burner gas cooktop, electric oven, butler's pantry and waterfall stone benches
- Four bedrooms with built-in or walk-in wardrobes
- Master bedroom with walk-in-wardrobe, private patio, ensuite with double shower and twin basin vanity
- Large fourth bedroom or media room with surround sound speakers
- Open plan living and dining with double stacker doors to outdoor entertaining
- Tiled rear alfresco with elevated valley views
- Gas connection for BBQ
- Dedicated office
- Remote blinds to main living and master
- Google sound system and WiFi CCTV security system
- Ducted My Air system
- 2.7m ceilings to open plan living
- Solar hot water system
- Approx. 45,000L rainwater capacity
- HSTP system
- 3m x 3m garden locker
- House wired for backup generator during blackouts
- Catchment zone for Glenview State School, Palmview State Secondary College and Chancellor State College
- Close proximity to Sunshine Coast Grammar School
- 5 mins to Bruce Highway and USC
- 20 mins to Sunshine Coast University Hospital and Mooloolaba Beach
- 20 mins to Maroochydore CBD
- 70 mins to Brisbane CBD and International Airport

Disclaimer: McGrath will not be held liable for errors, parties to determine if information is accurate.
